title: Enhancing Self-Regulated Learning Competencies in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in online/offline learning environments and basic project management skills
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment for social domain job skill development, cultivating learners' self-regulated planning, monitoring, and adjustment of their learning processes.

learning_goals: Students develop at least three checklists to periodically monitor their learning progress in blended learning environments

Based on two weeks of self-directed learning observation, learners create a weekly plan allocating 20 hours of study per week (6:4 ratio between online/theory and offline/practice), developing a strategy meeting ≥4 of 5 training institution checklist items (balance, realism, flexibility, etc.)
Students revise self-regulated learning strategies at least twice using peer feedback and learning analytics data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
